snippet: Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi, the deposed Libyan leader, broke more than a week of public silence with a recorded message to his followers, denouncing the provisional government that succeeded him.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )

lead_paragraph: Col. Muammar el-Qaddafi, the deposed Libyan leader, broke more than a week of public silence with a recorded message to his followers, denouncing the provisional government that succeeded him.

headline.main: Qaddafi Urges Followers to ‘Rise Up’ and Fill the Streets
headline.print_headline: Qaddafi Urges Followers to ‘Rise Up’ and Fill the Streets
headline.seo: In Recording, Qaddafi Urges Followers to ‘Rise Up’
